adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: azure-ai-foundry-1

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Azure AI Foundry API key from the Azure portal.

api_base.title: Endpoint URL
api_base.description: Azure AI Foundry endpoint URL. Example: https://<resource-name>.<region>.inference.ai.azure.com/ or https://<deployment>-serverless.<region>.inference.ai.azure.com/

model.title: Model
model.description: The model name deployed in Azure AI Foundry. Examples: command-r-plus, mistral-large-latest, gpt-4o

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies. Leave empty to use model default.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt when a request fails.
